traits.name: Volcanic
traits.description: A volatile world marked by intense volcanic activity, creating a hazardous environment with the potential for valuable resource extraction, such as rare metals and geothermal energy.

traits.name: Outpost
traits.description: A small, remote settlement providing essential services and a safe haven for travelers passing through.

traits.name: Salt Flats
traits.description: Expansive, barren plains covered in a thick layer of salt, offering unique opportunities for resource extraction, scientific research, and other activities.

traits.name: Scarce Life
traits.description: A waypoint with sparse signs of life, often presenting unique challenges for survival and adaptation in a harsh environment.

traits.name: Thin Atmosphere
traits.description: A location with a sparse atmosphere, making it difficult to support life without specialized life-support systems.

traits.name: Marketplace
traits.description: A thriving center of commerce where traders from across the galaxy gather to buy, sell, and exchange goods.
